name: Boundless Sky
description:
Title: Boundless Sky

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview:

An endless runner game where you avoid falling off or being pushed off the platform. See how long you can last as the platforms gain speed!

Instructions:

Aim to reach a high score by surviving for as long as possible. Press the "Up" arrow key to start the game. Continue to press "Up" in order to jump. You may choose to press "Enter" to restart the game.

Game Design Team

Ariana Kim - Game Designer
